events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer position, showcasing a strong background in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The application was reviewed and categorised under Engineering given the candidate's experience with software development and devops tools.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires was assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process and schedule interviews.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to assess the candidateâ€™s communication skills and verify their software engineering experience.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity, confirming availability for the technical interview.
A technical interview with the engineering team was scheduled for the candidate on May 7th to evaluate their coding and problem-solving skills.
